objects.specification: A large light gray floor panel spanning the booth area, with a matte finish and subtle texture that provides a neutral backdrop for exhibit elements while offering gentle slip resistance.
A tall white wall panel with a smooth matte finish and crisp right-angled edges, forming the front boundary of the booth and reflecting ambient light uniformly.
A tall white wall panel with a smooth matte finish and crisp right-angled edges, forming the back boundary of the booth and reflecting ambient light uniformly.
A tall white wall panel with a smooth matte finish and crisp right-angled edges, forming the left boundary of the booth and reflecting ambient light uniformly.
A tall white wall panel with a smooth matte finish and crisp right-angled edges, forming the right boundary of the booth and reflecting ambient light uniformly.

A high-fidelity demo car model with a sleek aerodynamic body, glossy metallic paint finish, realistic wheel assemblies and tinted glass windows, showcasing fine surface details and reflective contours.

A sleek rectangular exhibition table with a smooth tabletop surface and slender supportive legs, featuring a slight sheen to contrast with the floor and designed at ergonomic height for visitor interaction.
A modern visitor chair with padded seat and backrest, slender metal legs, upholstered in a neutral fabric tone, featuring an ergonomic angled back designed to face the table.
A modern visitor chair with padded seat and backrest, slender metal legs, upholstered in a neutral fabric tone, featuring an ergonomic angled back designed to face the table.
A slim rectangular ceiling light fixture with integrated diffused LED modules, providing bright, even downward illumination over the demo car, with a minimalist low-profile housing.
A vertical rectangular fabric banner mounted by a slim rod frame, made of high-quality material with slight sheen, designed to hang flush against the wall and face the booth interior.
A vertical rectangular fabric banner mounted by a slim rod frame, made of high-quality material with slight sheen, designed to hang flush against the wall and face the booth interior.
A vertical rectangular fabric banner mounted by a slim rod frame, made of high-quality material with slight sheen, designed to hang flush against the wall and face the booth interior.
An interactive information kiosk featuring a touchscreen display mounted on a slender pedestal, with an angled user interface panel and illuminated bezel for clear visibility.
A decorative potted plant with lush green foliage and naturalistic leaf clusters, housed in a simple round pot with a matte ceramic finish for a welcoming accent.
A decorative potted plant with lush green foliage and naturalistic leaf clusters, housed in a simple round pot with a matte ceramic finish for a welcoming accent.
A decorative potted plant with lush green foliage and naturalistic leaf clusters, housed in a simple round pot with a matte ceramic finish for a welcoming accent.
A decorative potted plant with lush green foliage and naturalistic leaf clusters, housed in a simple round pot with a matte ceramic finish for a welcoming accent.
